channel.title: Experimental Forum of Lies 1 - Deaf and Afraid - The Unseen Win!
channel.description:
## [color=darkblue]Welcome to Experimental Forum of Lies 1![/color] # [color=darkblue]Deaf and Afraid[/color] <small>Hosted by Marluxion</small>
### [color=darkblue] Rules [/color]
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515
### [color=darkblue] Gameplay [/color] Days will be 3 IRL days long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 1 IRL day long Actions are done by messaging me Unseen/Cult will talk through a special Discord server Priest will speak with the dead through a separate Discord server All classes will be used, and will be used as they are found in the [Class Cards Thread](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-now-officially-official/1998/) When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it
### [color=darkblue] Executions [/color] To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" Once majority is reached to accuse someone, a trial will begin. Either after 24 hours or once a trial reaches majority on pardon/execute, the trial will end. After the trial ends, the King has 12 hours to choose to allow or veto the vote, if the king does not respond the vote is allowed Executions end the Day
# [color=darkblue]Special Experimental Changes[/color] 1. Feedback has been greatly reduced for all classes. The only feedback that will be given is A) If you die. B) Investigation Results C) If you start bleeding. D) If you've been made unable to vote. E) If you've been jailed by the prince. No other feedback will be granted. 2. There will be a limit of 2 trials per in-game day. If the second trial ends but the target is not executed, the day will end early.
### [color=darkblue] Journals [/color] Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
### [color=darkblue] To Join[/color] To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
# [color=darkblue]Players: [/color] 1. [color=red]**orangeandblack5**[/color] - [color=steblue]**The Knight**[/color] 2. [color=red]**PoisonedSquid**[/color] - [color=steblue]**The Sheriff**[/color] 3. [color=red]**Vulgard**[/color] - [color=grey]**The Reaper**[/color] 4. [color=red]**Boss110**[/color] - [color=steblue]**The Drunk**[/color] 5. **MTheJoker** 6. [color=red]**Memesky**[/color] - [color=steblue]**The Hunter**[/color] 7. [color=red]**Damafaud**[/color] - [color=grey]**The Fool**[/color] 8. [color=red]**Moleland**[/color] - [color=steblue]**The Prince**[/color] 9. [color=red]**Ashe**[/color] - [color=steblue]**The Princess**[/color] 10. [color=red] **Marcus**[/color] - [color=grey]**The Scorned**[/color] 11. [color=red]**Insanity**[/color] - [color=steblue]**The Physician**[/color] 12. [color=red]**Frostwolf**[/color] - [color=purple]**The Servant**[/color] 13. [color=red]**Pug**[/color] - [color=steblue]**The Physician**[/color] 14. [color=red] **Firekitten**[/color] - [color=steblue]**The Observer**[/color] 15. [color=red]**PokemonKidRyan**[/color] - [color=purple]**The Mastermind**[/color] 16. **Shurian :crown:**
Backups: HTM, Lightethos, Icibalus
# [color=darkblue]Shortcuts[/color] :chains: [**Start of Game** ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/experimental-forum-of-lies-1-deaf-and-afraid-day-2-let-there-be-light/67991/78?u=marluxion) [**Start of Day 2** ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/experimental-forum-of-lies-1-deaf-and-afraid-day-2-let-there-be-light/67991/157?u=marluxion) [**Start of Day 3**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/experimental-forum-of-lies-1-deaf-and-afraid-day-3-an-unpleasant-knight/67991/1848?u=marluxion) [**Start of Day 4**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/experimental-forum-of-lies-1-deaf-and-afraid-day-3-an-unpleasant-knight/67991/2324?u=marluxion) [**Start of Day 5**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/experimental-forum-of-lies-1-deaf-and-afraid-day-4-the-noble-fool/67991/2556?u=marluxion) [**Start of Day 6**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/experimental-forum-of-lies-1-deaf-and-afraid-day-5-sheriff-tariff-9-16/67991/2768?u=marluxion)
